Parameters.Name: ACCESSCONTROL-11-1-2 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS (EXTERNAL AUTHORIZATION)

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS (EXTERNAL AUTHORIZATION)
Test.Name: Correct response
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true"

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS (EXTERNAL AUTHORIZATION)
Test.Name: [DEP]Correct response Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "false"
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present Access Point has Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "false" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true"

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
ACCESSCONTROL-11-1-2 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS (EXTERNAL AUTHORIZATION)
STEP 1 - Get Access Control service address Transmit done Receive done http://localhost:19266/onvif/ServicePACS12/PACSService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that the DUT returned Access Control service address STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Get AccessPointInfo list Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Check that the list of AccessPointInfos is not empty STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Check there is appropriate Access Point There is no appropriate Access Points STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS (EXTERNAL AUTHORIZATION)
Test.Name: [DEP]The second notify message is for other token
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There are two Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true" DUT sends the first event for one AccessPoint, the second event for the other AccessPoint

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS (EXTERNAL AUTHORIZATION)
Test.Name: [DEP]The notify message is for AccessPoint which not have required Capabilities
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There are two Access Point: one with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true", other with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "false" DUT sends the first event for AccessPoint with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "false"
